# init(mutating:)

**Initializer**

Creates a mutable typed buffer pointer referencing the same memory as the given immutable buffer pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(mutating other: UnsafeBufferPointer<Element>)
```

## Parameters

- **other**: The immutable buffer pointer to convert.
title: init(mutating:)
